imageList.tag: Biryani: where every bite is a celebration of flavors!
Good starters make for great meals
Start with a bite, savor the delight!
A good curry warms the heart and feeds the soul

reviews.name: Loreto Urquiza
reviews.review: They have the tastiest butter chicken. NO chemical aftertaste. I'd say it's perfect, actually! This outlet's portions are good and the service is prompt. Their packaging is leak-free... it never opens nor falls apart. My fellow colleagues are also pleased with them. We are quickly becoming regulars.

reviews.name: Varsha Vinnakota
reviews.review: In this day - with these prices! I'm loving it. Have ordered the loaded chicken bowl and it was worth it. The rice was so delicious, flavorful, and fresh. Would like to see more salad next time :) And make a red carpet for Irani chai <3

reviews.name: Eric Hill-Keast
reviews.review: Great takeout! Stumbled upon this place a few weeks back and keep going back. Excellent food, great prices, and friendly staff. Ordered lunch for a group of 15 last week and it was a great experience. Called in the order the day before, and they called me about an hour before pickup to confirm the order and give me the chance to make last minute changes. Food was ready on time, and they even helped me carry it out to my car.

reviews.name: Bharath Victor
reviews.review: As we know, we have a growing competition recently in Ottawa with many new restaurants in town but trust me... maintaining this good quality and taste with this pricing is a big HIT & MUST TRY. I would rate the taste 9.5/10 with 10/10 in pricing. As of today I loved chicken65 biryani and chicken starters that I tried.

reviews.name: Muhammad Akram
reviews.review: Just found this hidden gem today while browsing for halal options for lunch near my office. I am glad I decided to go and try it. I ordered Chicken Biryani and my first impression was 'Man this seems to be a big portion'. Opened up the container and the aromatic basmati rice with an abundance of chicken and the first bite gave me that Wowww. So flavorful and perfect balance of spices meat and rice with yogurt raita. I would definitely go again and try other dishes that they offer. Highly recommended 👏👏

reviews.name: Raju Palath
reviews.review: I bought vegetable Biriyani on February 07, 2024. Tasty food at an affordable price. Take out only. Good quality and quantity. Recommend this place.

reviews.name: John Gavin
reviews.review: Popped in for a late lunch, asked for a Butter Chicken Bowl and received it in under 5 mins. I'm writing this review whilst eating the bowl; it is unreal! Definitely try this place out if you can.

reviews.name: Premnath Chiruvella
reviews.review: At the Biryani Outlet, the affordable prices don’t compromise on the quantity and taste. The food we ordered was not just delicious but also easy on the wallet. Finally, a wallet-friendly gem delivering great flavors from India, in Ottawa!
